SA15dhkprviu:2: asataḥ sapakṣān na nivṛttir ity asapakṣa eva nāstīti cet* /
SA15dhkprviu:3: neti saiva nivṛtter nirvṛttiḥ asataḥ katham iṣṭā /
SA15dhkprviu:6: bhāvapratiṣedhas tu na saṃbhavatīty askhalitaprajño devānāṃpriyo yas tadviṣayaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ necchati /
SA15dhkprviu:11: na cāsann ātmā sattāsādhanavṛtteḥ sandigdhaḥ syāt* /
SA15dhkprviu:14: 4: na copagamabalena sapakṣāsapakṣau vyavasthāpya pramāṇapravartanaṃ yuktam* /
SA15dhkprviu:24: anyathā kvacid dṛṣṭe 'bhāvasidhāv api syād evādṛṣṭe saṃśayaḥ /
SA15dhkprviu:25: tathā hy asakalavyaktibhedavyāpino 'py arthāḥ kecit tajjātisaṃbhavino dṛṣṭāḥ pārthivālohalekhyavat* /
SA15dhkprviu:30: ātmapratiniyame hi tatkāryātmatayā prāṇādīnāṃ nairātmyena saha virodhaḥ
SA15dhkprviu:33: astu nāma nirātmakebhyo vyatirekaḥ prāṇādīnāṃ tadbhāve ca nairātmyavyāvṛttiḥ /
SA15dhkprviu:41: 5: na prāṇādisaṃbhavena nairātmyavyāvartanād ātmagati / kiṃ tarhi vidhimukhenaiva prāṇādayaḥ
